brief: Develop a backend API to manage student assessments and feedback.
business_problem: Educational institutions struggle to provide timely feedback on assessments, impacting student performance. A streamlined system is essential for enhancing learning outcomes and engagement.
target_users: Educators and students using an online learning platform
goals: Create endpoints for submitting and retrieving assessments
assessment_criteria: API performance, security measures, and alignment with educational needs

user_stories.title: Submit student assessments
user_stories.description: As an educator, I want to submit student assessments so that they can receive timely feedback.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am authenticated, when I submit an assessment, it is stored in the database.
The system confirms submission with a success message.
I can view a list of submitted assessments with their status.

user_stories.title: Retrieve assessment feedback
user_stories.description: As a student, I want to retrieve feedback on my assessments to understand my performance.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am logged in, when I request feedback, I receive it in a structured format.
Feedback includes scores and comments from the educator.
I can view feedback for all my submitted assessments.

user_stories.title: Authenticate users securely
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to securely log in to access my assessments and feedback.
acceptance_criteria: Given I enter valid credentials, I am granted access to the system.
Invalid credentials result in an error message.
Sessions are managed securely to prevent unauthorized access.
